rooms.description: Small foyer with minimalistic Scandinavian design, using light wood and neutral color palette. Adheres to Vastu principles by orienting entrance towards the east.

Spacious living room with open floor plan, featuring Scandinavian simplicity and functionality. Large windows on north and south walls for balanced natural light. Vastu principles: seating area oriented east.

Compact kitchen with efficient layout. Integrated storage solutions in line with Scandinavian design aesthetics. Includes a small dining counter that doubles as prep space, ensuring energy flow and connectivity per Vastu.

Functional bathroom with minimal fixtures to maintain budget. Scandinavian design elements like simple tiles and clean lines; placement in south-west corner as per Vastu guidelines for water-related functions.
